name: @galpha/proto
description: Protocol Buffers definitions for Galpha services with TypeScript support

scripts.generate: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run generate:js && npm run generate:ts && npm run compile
scripts.generate:js: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o dist/proto.js proto/ledger/v1/http.proto proto/position_manager/v1/rpc.proto proto/user_service/v1/http.proto
scripts.generate:ts: pbts -o dist/proto.d.ts dist/proto.js && npm run generate:index
